entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:04 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -36.1°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
